CustomField.formula:
IF( Expiry_Date_Status__c = "Good", " All Good ", NULL)
&
IF(Vaccine_Due_Distemper__c < TODAY(), IMAGE("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=068c00000013Ric&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05Tc0000006l4b4",'*',15,15) & " Distemper Vaccination is expired" & BR() , IMAGE("/img/samples/rating2.gif",'*') & " Distemper Vaccination is good until " & TEXT(Vaccine_Due_Distemper__c) & BR())
&
IF(Vaccine_Due_Hepatitis__c < TODAY(), IMAGE("/img/samples/rating1.gif",'*') & " Hepatitis Vaccination is expired" & BR() , IMAGE("/img/samples/rating2.gif",'*') & " Hepatitis Vaccination is good until " & TEXT(Vaccine_Due_Hepatitis__c) & BR())
&
IF(Vaccine_Due_Parainfluenza__c < TODAY(), IMAGE("/img/samples/rating1.gif",'*') & " Parainflunenza Vaccination is expired" & BR() , IMAGE("/img/samples/rating2.gif",'*') & " Parainflunenza Vaccination is good until " & TEXT(Vaccine_Due_Parainfluenza__c) & BR())
&
IF(Vaccine_Due_Parvovirus__c < TODAY(), IMAGE("/img/samples/rating1.gif",'*') & " Paravovirus Vaccination is expired" & BR() , IMAGE("/img/samples/rating2.gif",'*') & " Paravovirus Vaccination is good until " & TEXT(Vaccine_Due_Parvovirus__c) & BR())
&
IF(Vaccine_Due_Rabies__c < TODAY(), IMAGE("/img/samples/rating1.gif",'*') & " Rabies Vaccination is expired" & BR() , IMAGE("/img/samples/rating2.gif",'*') & " Rabies Vaccination is good until " & TEXT(Vaccine_Due_Rabies__c) & BR())
&
IF(Physical_Exam_Due__c < TODAY(), IMAGE("/img/samples/rating1.gif",'*') & " Physical Exam is not up to date" & BR() , IMAGE("/img/samples/rating2.gif",'*') & " Physical Exam is good until " & TEXT(Physical_Exam_Latest__c) & BR())
CustomField.label: Health Care Records Status
